title: Configuration Schema for LoLLMs WebUI Fork

server.description: Server settings for the web application.

host.description: Host address to bind the server to (e.g., '0.0.0.0' for all interfaces).

port.description: Port number for the server (as a string).

data_dir.description: Directory for user-specific discussion files and SafeStore DBs.

database_url.description: Connection URL for the central SQLite database.

secret_key.description: Secret key for Flask sessions or JWT tokens.

access_token_expires_mintes.description: Access token expiration time in minutes.

initial_admin_user.description: Credentials for the initial admin user to be created.

password.description: Plain text password for the initial admin (will be hashed).

lollms_client_defaults.description: Global default settings for the LoLLMs client.

binding_name.description: Name of the LoLLMs binding to use (e.g., 'ollama', 'llamacpp').

default_model_name.description: Default model name for the selected binding.

models_path.description: Path to models, typically for local bindings like 'llamacpp'.

host_address.description: Host address for the LLM service (e.g., Ollama URL, OpenAI API endpoint).

service_key_env_var.description: Environment variable name holding the API key (e.g., 'OPENAI_API_KEY').

ctx_size.description: Default context size for the LLM.

user_name.description: Default name for the user in prompts.

ai_name.description: Default name for the AI in prompts.

safe_store_defaults.description: Global default settings for the SafeStore.

chunk_size.description: Default chunk size in characters for SafeStore.

chunk_overlap.description: Default chunk overlap in characters for SafeStore.

global_default_vectorizer.description: Default vectorizer model name (e.g., a Sentence Transformer model).

encryption_key.description: Global encryption key for SafeStores. Null or omit to disable.
